alert.note: Alert for Morgan; Perry (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 12:11AM EDT until June 14 at 12:45AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: The National Weather Service in Charleston West Virginia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Perry County in southeastern Ohio... Morgan County in southeastern Ohio... * Until 1245 AM EDT. * At 1210 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near North Zanesville to near Pickerington, moving southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... New Lexington, McConnelsville, Somerset, Shawnee, Perry State Forest, Crooksville, Thornville, Junction City, New Straitsville, Malta, Corning, Bristol, Glenford, Hemlock, Rendville, Burr Oak State Park, Hackney and Eagleport. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Charleston West Virginia.
